title: IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData.ISetBodies
description: Sets the bodies to move or rotate and copy.
signature:
void ISetBodies( 
   System.Int32
NCount
,
   ref Body2
PBodies
)

parameters.name: NCount
parameters.description: Number of bodies to move or rotate and copy

parameters.name: PBodies
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of bodies of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
Use:
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::Copy
to get whether to copy the bodies
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::TransformType
to get whether to move or rotate the bodies
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
